title: YouTube Music artist pages now list songs and albums ‘From your library,’ like Play Music
content:
After rolling out a redesigned “Add to playlist” UI, YouTube Music is adding a “From your library” section to artist pages that is similar to something that was found in Google Play Music. 

more…

The post YouTube Music artist pages now list songs and albums ‘From your library,’ like Play Music  appeared first on 9to5Google.
